column1: OtherSpeak : Or maybe a good old game of…

column2: Choice : Rock paper scissors, of course.

column1: OtherSpeak : It’s simple, its only ONE HAND, and we both put 50 gold.
OtherSpeak : Then you get mine if you win.
column9: OtherSpeak : Simple, you throw dice, and if you roll a six

column1: Choice : After careful consideration, Ill pass (leave)
column10: OtherSpeak : You get your cherished NOMTRESOR information.

column3: OtherSpeak : I’m afraid you don’t have enouh gold, sonny!

column9: OtherSpeak : Remember : the more dice you decide to roll, the more chances you have to win...
OtherSpeak : but it's also more expensive to play!
OtherSpeak : How many dice do you want to roll?

column3: OtherSpeak : Ha! Your money is mine!

column15: OtherSpeak : That’s 100 golds to play, please.

column14: OtherSpeak : Sorry but you need more gold to play...
column17: OtherSpeak : I’m afraid you don’t have enough coins.
column20: OtherSpeak : Come back when you have enough coins!

column16: OtherSpeak : Here are the dices, roll them!

column11: OtherSpeak : You just lost 30 gold, pal
column14: OtherSpeak : You just lost 70 gold, pal
column17: OtherSpeak : You just lost 100 gold, pal
column20: OtherSpeak : You just lost 150 gold, pal

column3: OtherSpeak : That’s right, give me that gold!

column4: OtherSpeak : I guess 50 gold are worth a piece of information about NOMTRESOR after all.
OtherSpeak : A man got drunk at our table and said he made a breakthrough about the treasure.
OtherSpeak : Didn’t make any sense to us though.
OtherSpeak : Not a location, not a name, but a very random word.
